Name: Cheeseburger
Description: A juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, and tomato.

Name: Vegetarian Pizza
Description: A delightful pizza with a variety of fresh vegetables on a crispy crust.

Name: Grilled Chicken Salad
Description: Grilled chicken served with fresh greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and dressing.

Description: A classic pizza with mozzarella, tomatoes, and fresh basil.

Name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Description: Classic Italian spaghetti with creamy sauce, bacon, and parmesan.

Name: BBQ Ribs
Description: Tender ribs glazed with a smoky BBQ sauce, served with fries.

Description: Delicious tacos filled with seasoned veggies, guacamole, and salsa.
